words.source: H5750 adv. ʿod 'still, yet' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'as yet', ESV 'you are still', NASB 'you still'
H5549 Hithpolel ptc. ms of סָלַל 'to lift up, exalt'; KJV 'exaltest thou thyself', ESV 'exalting yourself', NASB 'exalting yourself'
H5971 prep. b- + n.ms constr. ʿam 'people' + 1cs suff.; KJV 'against my people', ESV 'against my people', NASB 'against my people'
H1115 prep. l- + neg. conj. bilti 'not'; KJV 'that thou wilt not', ESV 'and will not', NASB 'not'
H7971 Piel inf. constr. + 3mp suff. of שָׁלַח 'to send'; KJV 'let them go', ESV 'let them go', NASB 'letting them go'
